CustomField.formula: IF( AND(OR(AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 26,MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 1), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 24,MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 2, YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))/4 = 0), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 23,MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 2, YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))/4 <> 0), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 26,MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 3), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 25,MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 4), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 26,MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 5), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 25,MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 6), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 26,MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 7), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 26,MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 8), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 25, MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 9), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 26, MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 10), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 25, MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 11), AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 26, MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 12)) ), true, false)
CustomField.label: Ultimos 5 dias mes
